name: CoronaryArteryDiseaseCAD_ICD9
title: Coronary Artery Disease (CAD)_ICD9
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for CAD Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute CAD Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: CAD Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: CAD ICD9 Codes that constitute the CAB Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
